glsa.title: RPCBind: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in RPCBind might allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service.

background.p: The RPCBind utility is a server that converts RPC program numbers into universal addresses.

description.p: A use-after-free vulnerability was discovered in RPCBindâ€™s svc_dodestroy function when trying to free a corrupted xprt->xp_netid pointer.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All RPCBind users should upgrade to the latest version:
